characterabilities.name: Alpha Hunter
characterabilities.description: Warbeasts in this model's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can run, charge, or make power attacks without being forced. When this model destroys one or more enemy modes during its activation, warbeasts in its battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and MAT for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Cleave
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can make one additional melee attack. This model can make only one additional attack as a result of Cleave each activation.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [2"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 2", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

feat.name: Avalanche of Steel
feat.description: Friendly faction warrior models within Kyrrax’s Control range gain a +2 bonus to melee accuracy rolls. Additionally, when a friendly faction model within his Control range destroys or removes from play one or more enemy models with an attack, one friendly faction warrior model within his Control range may make a 2” advance followed by a basic melee attack. A model may only move and attack as a result of Avalanche of Steel once per game. Avalanche of Steel lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Set Defense

ability.name: Repel
ability.description: When this model hits an enemy model with this weapon, the model hit is pushed 1” directly away from this model. When this model is hit with a melee attack, after the attack is resolved the attacking model is pushed 1” directly away from this model. This model loses Repel while this weapon system is crippled.

spells.name: Unstoppable Force

(When a model with Bulldoze is B2B with an enemy model during its Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2” directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when a model makes a trample power attack.)

characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Circle Orboros, Convergence of Cyriss, Crucible Guard, Cryx, Cygnar, Grymkin, Infernals, Ios, Khador, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Llael, Ord, Orgoth, Protectorate of Menoth, Religion of the Twins, Searforge Commission, Skorne, Supernal Coalition, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance, Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Circle Orboros, Convergence of Cyriss, Crucible Guard, Cryx, Cygnar, Grymkin, Infernals, Ios, Khador, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Llael, Ord, Orgoth, Protectorate of Menoth, Religion of the Twins, Searforge Commission, Skorne, Supernal Coalition, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance, Trollbloods.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor: Guard Tower
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.
